attributes.action: roundabout at Warrington Road Leigh a580 east Lancashire Road. Manchester
attributes.additional_details: There have been so many near miss incidents and not to mention the endless about of accidents that have happened on this roundabout it will just be a matter of time before it will be an innocent pedestrian or even a child / cyclists trying to cross this dangerous roundabout.
attributes.background: Make it safer for pedestrians and cyclists to cross this area as they have no chance at all of crossing this dangerous roundabout people's lives are at great risk of crossing there on this roundabout. Also all traffic is speeding around this area putting each other at a high risk of injury.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
